input.sentences: i do n't think there are any more rabid fans on earth than the bapfts fans ! they line up for hours to see the team .
the pre-game show is amazing . all different groups come out to get the crowd riled up .
when everyone starts screaming `` bapfts ! bapfts ! `` | you can feel the place rock .
the cheerleaders even get drowned out !
the band starts playing the bapfts fight song | and you can feel the energy a mile away .
output.sentences: The fans of the team were nearly rabid, waiting in the line.
They really got riled during the pre game show!
We knew it wasn't long until the crowd starts screaming, "Let's rock this!"
Soon all other noise was drowned out by cheerleaders.
The game starts when the school song is playing by the school band.
